description.narrative: In Mongolia, children are experiencing restrictions as a result of COVID-19 since the end of January 2020. These restrictions mean no school, no meetups with friends, limited recreation activities and the inability of children to access safe spaces for support. Together with other stress factors such as parents losing income and jobs, children’s mental health issues, tension in families and domestic violence have sharply increased over the last few months. The investment will: • Consultations with children and adolescents to ensure their perspectives and needs are incorporated to help to better target responses. • Disseminate information that is timely, factual, contextually appropriate, accurately translated and accessible to all. • Train personnel including child protection and development staff, and better detect violence against children for provision of child protection.
